title: How do i unblock a summoner
body: Can you help me unblock a sommoner

replies.body:
*Xeneth* offered a **fantastic** list of steps to unblock someone. Below are some visuals to go along with their instructions. 

(click to enlarge)

http://imgur.com/a/f7JG0



Let me know if this helped.

Sure.

1. Click on the "View Your Friends List" button in the lower right of the PvP.net client (lone person icon)
2. Expand the bar near the bottom of your Friends List that says "Block List"
3. Right-click on a Summoner name/icon in there
4. Select "Unblock Summoner"
